useLogging.description: Enable or disable logging. If `false` `basePath` is ignored. If `true` `basePath` is required @default ./logs

logDateTemplate.description: Log date template as indicated by @link https://day.js.org/docs/en/display/format @default "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss A"

decodeSearchParams.description: Enable or disable url search params decoding. @default false

basePath.description: Logging paths. Where the app and system logs will be stored

views.description: configuration reggarding de different pages of the web app

show.description: Weather or not to show the /logs page in navigation. Accessing directly to this route will result on a '403 This page has been disabled by configuration' error

captchaLength.description: Length of the captcha shown in the authentication page, recommended to use a low value for development.5

hide.description: The list of user distinguishedNames or sAMAccountNames that should not be shown in the list view and dropdowns]

limit.description: The maximum amount of users allowed in the directory. If set to null the limit will be ignored.l

hide.description: The list of group distinguishedNames or sAMAccountNames that should not be shown in the list view and dropdowns]

limit.description: The maximum amount of groups allowed in the directory. If set to null the limit will be ignored.l
